column5: FYI I busted a prop a while back.Black Max Mercury aluminum. Cost me 198 fpr a new one and decided to send mine to be rebuilt.One of my customers recomended this guy, and i just got it back today 78 bucks and its like a new one.Balanced and he even tuned it a bit to get me better speed and motor economy.  Bells Machining and Hydraulics 2021 Rogers Rd Perth Ont.  Always good to have a spare
I just sent one for repairs, I wish I had known of this guy.
its always great to know guys like that !!! and great to know he did a stellar job too !!
